title: Reforestation
subTitle: Rebuild the planet
desc: Grood is Cambodia’s best brand of electric bikes because we put people first. The most important part of every Grood isn’t some high-tech gadget or fancy bicycle component – it’s the person riding it. Producing great eBikes is just the beginning. To be truly great, a company has to stand for something. Grood stands for you.
